    • setPreFrame

      public void setPreFrame​(int preFrame)
      Set the pre-frame of the animation. Use this if the animation has a pre-phase before the animation loop (the pre-phase only plays when the animation is stopped or restarted).
      Parameters:
      preFrame - The pre-frame of the animation (-1 for no pre-frame).
